Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line expressing the A53T variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased α-synuclein aggregation levels observed in cells expressing the A53T variant compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: α-synuclein aggregation levels below 20% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: α-synuclein aggregation levels above 50% of wild-type.

Material used.Description: Immunohistochemistry was performed on brain tissue from transgenic mice expressing the A53T variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Neuronal loss and Lewy body formation observed in A53T transgenic mice brains.

Technical replicates.Description: Each slide was analyzed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mouse brain tissue was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Non-transgenic mouse brain tissue was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No Lewy body formation or neuronal loss observed.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of Lewy bodies and significant neuronal loss.

Material used.Description: Cell culture experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells transfected with A53T-SNCA plasmid.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased cellular toxicity and reduced viability in A53T-transfected HEK293 cells compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by post-hoc Tukey test.
